org.lantern
Interface XmppHandler

All Superinterfaces:
LanternService, Shutdownable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultXmppHandler
public interface XmppHandler
extends LanternService

Interface for dealing with any XMPP interaction in Lantern.

disconnect

connect

void connect()
             throws IOException,
                    CredentialException,
                    NotInClosedBetaException
Connects using stored credentials.

Throws:
IOException - If we cannot connect to the server.
CredentialException - If the credentials are incorrect.
NotInClosedBetaException - Exception for when the user is not in the closed beta.

connect

void connect(String email,
             String pwd)
             throws IOException,
                    CredentialException,
                    NotInClosedBetaException
Connects using stored credentials.

Parameters:
email - The user's e-mail address.
pwd - The user's password.
Throws:
IOException - If we cannot connect to the server.
CredentialException - If the credentials are incorrect.
NotInClosedBetaException - Exception for when the user is not in the closed beta.

addOrRemovePeer

void addOrRemovePeer(org.jivesoftware.smack.packet.Presence p,
                     String from)
Adds or removes a peer depending on the peer's availability advertised in its presence.

Parameters:
p - The presence.
from - The full peer JID.
